reviewText: Excellent wireless mouse, very responsive and comfortable to use.
Good mouse, but battery life could be better.
Yoga mat is perfect, great quality and non-slip.
Average mat, but worth the price.
Desk lamp is functional and looks great, slightly dim for my liking.
Fantastic lamp, adds a modern touch to my desk.
Works well, but feels a bit cheap for the price.
Perfect for my home workouts, love the durability.
Stylish and compact, fits perfectly on my desk.
Had issues with the mouse after a month of use.
